name: Get Your S#!P Togheter
description:
Restore the glory of Mother Russia in space, chaining asteroids together.

 Arm yourself with a shotgun and fight against evil space bears. 

Refill yourself with vodka and keep your ship repaired.

CONTROLS (Gamepad is required): 

    Right Trigger: Hook shot/Gunshot
    Left Stick: Character Movement
    Right Stick: Character aim
    Start: Pause Menu
    D-Pad: Menu navigation
    A (Xbox) or X (Playstation): Selection in the menu
    ALT+R: Restart (in case of game-breaking bugs)

This game was made during the 2020 Global Game Jam
